product_name: Brooks Ghost 6 GTX Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Light, cushioned, responsive and built for neutral runners, the waterproof Brooks Ghost 6 GTX road-running shoes keep you ready to go no matter what Mother Nature has in store. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof, breathable membranes keep the elements out. Lightweight and flexible polyester and nylon mesh uppers are abrasion resistant, breathable and dry quickly; overlays provide structure and support. Polyester and nylon air-mesh linings provide great moisture management to keep feet comfortable on the run. Special EVA compound used for the insole boards supplies excellent cushioning and flexibility. Midsoles feature BioMoGo foam polymer alloy, which provides cushioning, energy return and reduced foot fatigue; nontoxic additive helps midsoles break down in landfill. DNA cushioning uses high-viscosity liquid pods to react instantly to each step as you run, providing a custom amount of cushioning for your running style. Midsoles and outsoles are designed to align the foot in an efficient, balanced position throughout the gait cycle, offering great cushioning and flexibility. Brooks Ghost 6 GTX road-running shoes boast outsoles with a blend of blown rubber and regular rubber for balanced durability and grippy traction. Outsoles also feature a special decoupled crash pad design that smooths out the landing zone, maximizing efficiency and feel throughout the heel strike. All-synthetic construction makes the Brooks Ghost 6 GTX shoes vegan friendly.
short_description: Light, cushioned, responsive and built for neutral runners, the waterproof Brooks Ghost 6 GTX road-running shoes keep you ready to go no matter what Mother Nature has in store.
